  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/847</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/847</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Els animals es mouen, però... i les plantes?</string>
            <string language="en">Animals move... but do plants?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierbewegung... aber tun Betriebe?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mouvement d'animaux... mais font des usines ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O movimento dos animais... mas faz plantas?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il movimento degli animali... ma fa le piante?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα ζώα κινούνται... αλλά κάνουν τις εγκαταστάσεις;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) que explica com les plantes, si bé no es traslladen, sí que es mouen, ja que algunes de les seves parts, com les fulles, modifiquen la posició per orientar-se cap a la llum.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) that explains that even though plants don't move from place to place, they do move their parts, such as their leaves, which change their position to catch the light.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fulla</string>
            <string language="en">leaf</string>
            <string language="es">hoja</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">planta</string>
            <string language="en">plant</string>
            <string language="es">planta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) daß daß 
erklärt, obwohl Betriebe nicht von Platz zu Platz umziehen, 
verschieben sie ihre Teile, wie ihre Blätter, die ihre Position 
ändern, um das Licht abzufangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) qu'explique que quoique les
usines ne se déplacent pas d'un endroit à l'autre, elles déplacent 
leurs parties, telles que leurs feuilles, qui changent leur position 
pour attraper la lumière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) que explica que mesmo que as 
plantas não se movam do lugar para o lugar, movem suas partes, tais 
como suas folhas, que mudam sua posição para travar a luz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) che spiega che anche se le 
piante non si muovono da un posto ad un altro, spostano le loro parti,
quali i loro fogli, che cambiano la loro posizione per interferire la 
luce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) που εξηγούν ότι ακόμα κι αν 
οι εγκαταστάσεις δεν κινούνται από μέρος σε μέρος, αυτοί κινεί 
τα μέρη τους, όπως τα φύλλα τους, τα οποία αλλάζουν τη θέση τους
να πιάσουν το φως.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betrieb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">feuille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">usine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">foglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pianta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φύλλο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εγκαταστάσεις</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
